mapper.select: select * from ( select review_no, user_id, review_written_date, review_modify_date, isbn, review_ref, review_title, review_content, review_open, rank() over(partition by isbn order by review_modify_date desc, review_no desc) rk from review_board ) sub, book_cover bc where sub.rk = 1 and sub.isbn=bc.isbn
select * from review_board where isbn = #{isbn} order by review_written_date desc
